data.title: Getting Things Done (GTD)
data.description: Capture → Clarify → Organize → Reflect → Engage

data.title: The Pomodoro Technique
data.description: Set Goal → Work (25m) → Short Break (5m) → Repeat x4 → Long Break

data.title: Eisenhower Matrix
data.description: Categorize Urgency/Importance → Do → Decide → Delegate → Delete

data.title: Eat The Frog
data.description: Identify Hardest Task → Do First Thing → Move to Smaller Tasks

data.title: Time Blocking
data.description: List Tasks → Estimate Time → Assign Calendar Slots → Execute

data.title: Kanban
data.description: Backlog → To Do → In Progress → Review → Done

data.title: The 2-Minute Rule
data.description: Task < 2 mins? → Do Immediately → Task > 2 mins? → Defer/Delegate

data.title: Zero-Based Scheduling
data.description: List Available Hours → Assign Every Hour a Function → 0 Hours Remain

data.title: Biological Prime Time
data.description: Track Energy 1 Week → Identify Peaks → Schedule Deep Work → Admin in Troughs

data.title: Batching
data.description: Group Similar Tasks → Schedule Block → Execute Consecutively

data.title: Must/Should/Want
data.description: List Tasks → Label 'Must' → Label 'Should' → Label 'Want'

data.title: Ivy Lee Method
data.description: List 6 Tasks → Prioritize 1-6 → Start #1 → Work until Done → Repeat

data.title: Seinfeld Strategy
data.description: Pick Habit → Complete Daily → Mark X on Calendar → Don't Break Chain

data.title: Inbox Zero
data.description: Process Item → Delete? → Delegate? → Respond (<2m)? → Defer?

data.title: Pareto Analysis (80/20)
data.description: List Inputs → Identify Top 20% → Focus Solely on Top 20%

data.title: The 5 Whys
data.description: State Problem → Ask 'Why?' → Answer → Ask 'Why?' again → Repeat 5x → Root Cause

data.title: Fishbone Diagram
data.description: Define Effect → Draw Spine → Categorize Causes (Man/Machine/etc) → Brainstorm Sub-causes

data.title: DMAIC (Six Sigma)
data.description: Define → Measure → Analyze → Improve → Control

data.title: 8D (Eight Disciplines)
data.description: Form Team → Describe Problem → Containment → Root Cause → Corrective Action → Validate → Prevent → Recognize

data.title: PDCA (Deming Cycle)
data.description: Plan (Hypothesize) → Do (Test) → Check (Analyze) → Act (Implement)

data.title: TRIZ
data.description: Define Specific Problem → Match to General Problem → Find General Solution → Adapt to Specific

data.title: Cynefin Framework
data.description: Sense → Categorize → Respond (Simple) OR Sense → Analyze → Respond (Complicated)

data.title: First Principles
data.description: Deconstruct to Truths → Question Assumptions → Reconstruct Solution

data.title: Inversion
data.description: Define Goal → Define Failure Mode → Avoid Failure Steps

data.title: Rubber Duck Debugging
data.description: Get Duck → Explain Code Line-by-Line → Self-Correct

data.title: Kepner-Tregoe Matrix
data.description: Situation Appraisal → Problem Analysis → Decision Analysis → Potential Problem Analysis

data.title: A3 Problem Solving
data.description: Background → Current Condition → Goal → Root Cause → Countermeasures → Confirmation → Follow-up

data.title: CATWOE
data.description: Customers → Actors → Transformation → Worldview → Owners → Environment

data.title: OODA Loop
data.description: Observe → Orient → Decide → Act

data.title: SWOT Analysis
data.description: Analyze Internal (Strengths/Weaknesses) → Analyze External (Opportunities/Threats) → Match

data.title: Regret Minimization
data.description: Project to Age 80 → Ask 'Will I Regret This?' → Minimize Regret

data.title: SPADE
data.description: Setting → People → Alternatives → Decide → Explain

data.title: WRAP
data.description: Widen Options → Reality Test → Attain Distance → Prepare to be Wrong

data.title: Blue Ocean Strategy
data.description: Eliminate Factors → Reduce Factors → Raise Factors → Create Factors (ERRC)

data.title: Porter's Five Forces
data.description: Supplier Power → Buyer Power → Rivalry → Substitution → New Entry

data.title: PESTLE Analysis
data.description: Political → Economic → Social → Technological → Legal → Environmental

data.title: Eisenhardt's Options
data.description: Develop Option A → Develop Option B → Develop Option C → Compare Trade-offs → Select

data.title: RICE Score
data.description: Calculate (Reach × Impact × Confidence) / Effort → Sort by Score

data.title: Scenario Planning
data.description: Identify Drivers → Create Uncertainties Matrix → Develop 4 Scenarios → Strategy for Each

data.title: Pre-Mortem
data.description: Assume Failure → Brainstorm Reasons → Create Prevention Plan → Execute

data.title: BATNA
data.description: Determine Best Alternative → Set Reservation Price → Negotiate

data.title: Cost-Benefit Analysis
data.description: List Costs → List Benefits → Assign Values → Calculate Net

data.title: Design Thinking

data.title: SCAMPER
data.description: Substitute → Combine → Adapt → Modify → Put to use → Eliminate → Reverse

data.title: Six Thinking Hats

data.title: Lateral Thinking
data.description: Select Focus → Generate Provocation → Move to New Idea

data.title: Crazy 8s
data.description: Fold Paper 8x → Sketch 8 Ideas (8 mins) → Review

data.description: Discover (Diverge) → Define (Converge) → Develop (Diverge) → Deliver (Converge)

data.description: The Dreamer → The Realist → The Critic

data.title: SQ3R

data.description: Measure → Calculate Error → Apply Correction → Loop

data.description: Identify Constraint → Exploit → Subordinate → Elevate → Loop

data.description: Applied Effort → Build Momentum → Breakthrough → Reduced Effort → Loop

data.title: Kaizen
data.description: Standardize → Measure → Compare → Innovate → Standardize (Loop)

data.title: The Habit Loop
data.description: Cue (Trigger) → Routine (Behavior) → Reward → Craving (Loop)

data.title: Positive Feedback
data.description: Event A → Produces B → Amplifies A → Exponential Growth

data.title: Negative Feedback
data.description: Event A → Produces B → Reduces A → Stability

data.title: The Hook Model
data.description: Trigger → Action → Variable Reward → Investment → Trigger (Loop)

data.title: Boyd's E-M Theory
data.description: Energy State → Trade for Position/Speed → Regain Energy → Loop

data.title: Triple-Loop Learning
data.description: Result → Action (Single) → Assumptions (Double) → Identity (Triple)

data.title: Effectuation
data.description: Means → Affordable Loss → Contingencies → New Means → Loop

data.title: Decision Tree
data.description: Node → Branch A (Prob X) / Branch B (Prob Y) → Outcome → Value

data.title: Binary Search
data.description: Sort List → Pick Middle → Target < Middle? (Left) : Target > Middle? (Right)

data.title: Minimax Algorithm
data.description: Look Ahead → Maximize My Gain → Minimize Opponent Gain → Select

data.title: Fault Tree Analysis
data.description: Undesired Event → Logic Gate (OR/AND) → Lower Events → Root Causes

data.title: Event Tree Analysis
data.description: Initiating Event → System A Works? (Yes/No) → System B Works? (Yes/No) → Consequence

data.title: START Triage
data.description: Walking? (Green) → Breathing? (No=Black/Yes=Red) → Pulse? (Red) → Cap Refill?

data.title: Genetic Algorithm
data.description: Init Pop → Evaluate Fitness → Select → Crossover/Mutate → New Gen → Loop

data.title: Monte Carlo Sim
data.description: Define Domain → Generate Random Inputs → Loop x10k → Aggregate → Probability

data.title: If-Then-Else
data.description: Condition Met? → True Path ↔ Condition Failed? → False Path

data.title: Switch/Case
data.description: Input Variable → Case 1? → Case 2? → Case 3? → Default

data.title: Recursion
data.description: Function Call → Base Case Met? (Return) : Loop Deeper (Call Self)

data.title: STRIDE
data.description: Inspect Flow → Branch: Spoofing? Tampering? Repudiation? Info Disclosure? DoS?

data.title: Spiral Model
data.description: Objectives → Risks → Develop/Test → Plan Next → Loop (Expand)

data.title: Hermeneutic Circle
data.description: Understand Part → Understand Whole → Re-interpret Part → Re-interpret Whole → Loop

data.title: Bayesian Updating
data.description: Prior Belief → New Evidence → Likelihood → Posterior Belief (New Prior) → Loop

data.title: Design Sprint
data.description: Map (Mon) → Sketch (Tue) → Decide (Wed) → Prototype (Thu) → Test (Fri)

data.title: Gartner Hype Cycle
data.description: Trigger → Peak Expectations → Trough Disillusionment → Slope Enlightenment → Plateau

data.title: Product Life Cycle
data.description: Intro → Growth → Maturity → Saturation → Decline → Extension/Death

data.title: Transtheoretical Model
data.description: Pre-contemplation → Contemplation → Preparation → Action → Maintenance → Relapse (Loop)

data.description: Experience → Reflection → Conceptualization → Experimentation → Loop

data.title: Gibbs' Cycle
data.description: Description → Feelings → Evaluation → Analysis → Action Plan → Loop

data.title: Newton-Raphson
data.description: Guess Root → Calculate Tangent → Find Intercept → New Guess → Loop

data.title: Growth Hacking
data.description: Analyze Data → Ideate → Prioritize (ICE) → Test → Analyze → Loop

data.title: The 'V' Model
data.description: Reqs (Down) → Design (Down) → Code → Unit Test (Up) → System Test (Up)

data.description: Task → Responsible? → Accountable? → Consulted? → Informed?

data.description: Diagnose Level → Directing? → Coaching? → Supporting? → Delegating?

data.title: Cynefin (Logic)
data.description: Simple (Categorize) → Complicated (Analyze) → Complex (Probe) → Chaotic (Act)

data.title: McKinsey 7S

data.description: Sort → Set in Order → Shine → Standardize → Sustain (Loop)

data.description: Map (Split/Parallel) → Shuffle (Sort) → Reduce (Aggregate)

data.title: Git Flow
data.description: Main → Develop → Feature Branch (Loop) → Release → Merge Main

data.title: Neural Network Training
data.description: Initialize Weights → Forward Pass → Calculate Loss → Backward Pass (Backpropagation) → Update Weights → Repeat

data.title: Transformer Architecture
data.description: Input Embedding → Positional Encoding → Multi-Head Attention → Add & Norm → Feed Forward → Add & Norm → Output

data.title: Reinforcement Learning
data.description: Observe State → Select Action (Policy) → Receive Reward → Update Q-Table → Explore/Exploit → Loop

data.title: Attention Mechanism
data.description: Query → Key → Value → Similarity Score → Softmax → Weighted Sum → Context Vector

data.title: GANs (Generative Adversarial Networks)
data.description: Generator Creates → Discriminator Judges → Real/Fake Decision → Backprop Both → Adversarial Training

data.title: Transfer Learning
data.description: Pre-trained Model → Freeze Layers → Add Custom Head → Fine-tune Top Layers → Train on New Data

data.title: Data Augmentation Pipeline
data.description: Load Image → Random Crop → Random Flip → Color Jitter → Normalize → Batch → Train

data.title: Gradient Descent
data.description: Initialize Parameters → Calculate Gradient → Update Parameters → Check Convergence → Loop

data.title: Convolutional Neural Network
data.description: Input Image → Conv Layer → ReLU → Pooling → Flatten → Dense → Softmax → Classification

data.title: Recurrent Neural Network
data.description: Input Sequence → Hidden State → Process Token → Update State → Next Token → Loop

data.title: LSTM (Long Short-Term Memory)
data.description: Input → Forget Gate → Input Gate → Cell State Update → Output Gate → Hidden State

data.title: Encoder-Decoder
data.description: Encode Input → Context Vector → Decode → Generate Output → Attention Bridge

data.title: Beam Search
data.description: Start Token → Generate K Candidates → Score → Keep Top K → Expand → Repeat → Best Path

data.title: Batch Normalization
data.description: Batch Input → Calculate Mean/Variance → Normalize → Scale & Shift → Output

data.title: Dropout Regularization
data.description: Forward Pass → Randomly Drop Neurons → Train → Test (All Active) → Prevent Overfitting

data.title: Adam Optimizer
data.description: Gradient → First Moment (Momentum) → Second Moment → Bias Correction → Parameter Update

data.title: Cross Validation
data.description: Split Data K-Folds → Train on K-1 → Validate on 1 → Rotate → Average Performance

data.title: Early Stopping
data.description: Train Model → Monitor Validation Loss → Patience Counter → Stop if No Improvement → Best Model

data.title: Hyperparameter Tuning
data.description: Define Search Space → Random/Grid Search → Train → Evaluate → Select Best → Repeat

data.title: Model Ensembling
data.description: Train Multiple Models → Predictions → Voting/Averaging → Final Prediction

data.title: Feature Engineering
data.description: Raw Data → Extract Features → Select Important → Transform → Normalize → Model Input

data.title: Embedding Layer
data.description: Token ID → Lookup Table → Dense Vector → Positional Encoding → Model Input

data.title: Autoencoder
data.description: Encode → Bottleneck (Latent Space) → Decode → Reconstruction Loss → Train

data.title: Diffusion Model
data.description: Add Noise (Forward) → Learn Reverse → Denoise Step-by-Step → Generate Sample

data.title: CLIP (Vision-Language)
data.description: Image Encoder → Text Encoder → Contrastive Learning → Shared Embedding Space

data.title: RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation)
data.description: Query → Retrieve Documents → Embed Context → Generate Response → LLM Output

data.title: Chain of Thought
data.description: Problem → Step 1 → Step 2 → ... → Step N → Final Answer

data.title: Few-Shot Learning
data.description: Task Description → Example 1 → Example 2 → Example 3 → Your Turn → Response

data.title: Constitutional AI
data.description: Generate Response → Self-Critique → Revise → Principle Alignment → Final Output

data.title: RLHF (Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback)
data.description: Generate → Human Ranks → Train Reward Model → PPO Training → Aligned Model

data.title: Active Learning
data.description: Label Small Sample → Train Model → Find Uncertain Examples → Human Labels → Retrain → Loop

data.title: Curriculum Learning
data.description: Easy Examples → Medium Examples → Hard Examples → Progressive Training

data.title: Knowledge Distillation
data.description: Teacher Model → Soft Labels → Student Model → Match Distributions → Compressed Model

data.title: Pruning
data.description: Train Full Model → Identify Important Weights → Remove Low-Magnitude → Fine-tune → Smaller Model

data.title: Quantization
data.description: FP32 Weights → INT8 Conversion → Calibration → Quantized Model → Faster Inference

data.title: Model Deployment
data.description: Export Model → ONNX/TensorRT → Container → Load Balancer → Serve → Monitor

data.title: A/B Testing for Models
data.description: Model A → 50% Traffic → Model B → 50% Traffic → Compare Metrics → Winner

data.title: Feature Store
data.description: Raw Data → Feature Engineering → Store → Serve (Train/Inference) → Version Control

data.title: Model Monitoring
data.description: Production Model → Log Predictions → Detect Drift → Alert → Retrain Trigger

data.title: Continuous Training
data.description: New Data → Trigger → Retrain → Validate → Deploy → Monitor → Loop

data.title: Shadow Deployment
data.description: New Model → Mirror Production → Compare Results → No User Impact → Validation

data.title: Multi-Task Learning
data.description: Shared Layers → Task-Specific Heads → Joint Training → Transfer Knowledge

data.title: Meta-Learning
data.description: Learn to Learn → Inner Loop (Task) → Outer Loop (Meta) → Fast Adaptation

data.title: Neural Architecture Search
data.description: Search Space → Train Candidates → Evaluate → Select Best → Evolve

data.title: Explainable AI (SHAP)
data.description: Model Prediction → SHAP Values → Feature Importance → Visualization → Interpretation

data.title: Adversarial Training
data.description: Generate Adversarial Examples → Train on Both → Robust Model

data.title: Self-Supervised Learning
data.description: Unlabeled Data → Create Pretext Task → Train → Fine-tune → Downstream Task

data.title: Contrastive Learning
data.description: Augment Sample → Positive Pairs → Negative Pairs → Contrastive Loss → Representations

data.title: Prompt Engineering
data.description: System Prompt → User Input → Few-Shot Examples → Instructions → LLM Response

data.title: Agent Loop
data.description: Observe → Think (Reasoning) → Act (Tool Use) → Observe Result → Loop

data.title: ReAct Pattern
data.description: Thought → Action → Observation → Thought → Action → ... → Answer
